Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ADCU_DEV_STATUS

device Device operating status.

Enumerator
ADCU_DEV_STATUS_NORMAL 

Device operating status is ok

ADCU_DEV_STATUS_ABNORMAL 

Device operating status is error

Function Documentation

int adcuDevClose ( int  DevId)

close device channel

Parameters
DevId: function adcuDevOpen() return value.
Return values
ADCU_DEV_STATUS_NORMAL
ADCU_DEV_STATUS_ABNORMAL
int adcuDevOpen ( adcuDeviceType  DevType,
int  channel 
)

open specify device with channel,and if open successfully return a positive integer represents device id else return 0.

Parameters
adcuDeviceType: adcu support devices,eg.adcuCAN/adcuRS232.
channel: channel num, you can use adcuChannel:ADCU_CHANNEL_1, ADCU_CHANNEL_2 , ADCU_CHANNEL_3, ADCU_CHANNEL_4.
Return values
<0: if an error occurred
DevId: a positive integer
int adcuDevRead ( int  DevId,
uint8_t *  buf,
int  size 
)

Read 'size' bytes into BUF from 'DevId'. Return the number read, -1 for errors.

Parameters
DevId: function adcuDevOpen() return value.
buf: a point of buffer to receive data.
size: receive data size.
Return values
<=0: read error.
>0: the actual size of read.
int adcuDevStatus ( int  DevId)

get the status of device.

Parameters
DevId: function adcuDevOpen() return value.
Return values
ADCU_DEV_STATUS_NORMAL
ADCU_DEV_STATUS_ABNORMAL
int adcuDevWrite ( int  DevId,
uint8_t *  buf,
int  size 
)

Write 'size' bytes of BUF to 'DevId'. Return the number written, or -1.

Parameters
DevId: function adcuDevOpen() return value.
buf: a point of buffer to write data.
size: write size.
Return values
<=0: write error.
>0: the actual size of write.
void adcuSDKDeinit ( )

clear running state

int adcuSDKInit ( )

Init running state.

Return values
0: success
-1: if an error occurred
